header.name: Ring of the Wild Hunt
header.subtitle: Forged in the Moonwell of Eternal Spring, blessed by the Great Bear Spirit

footer.left: Ring of the Wild Hunt ‚Ä¢ 3rd of 7 ‚Ä¢ Forged by Archdruid Kelthanas Ironbark

content.text: This ancient iron ring bears intricate carvings of intertwining vines punctuated by tiny animal tracks ‚Äî wolf paws, bear claws, eagle talons, and deer hooves that seem to circle endlessly around the band. When worn by a Beast Master, the etchings emit a faint green luminescence, and the ranger's animal companion's eyes occasionally gleam with the same emerald light. The ring feels warm to the touch when beasts are near, and observers swear the carved vines slowly shift when viewed from the corner of one's eye.

subsections.name: Tactical Combinations
bullets: Use telepathic bond for silent coordination in ambushes
Share senses for scouting while maintaining your position
Ironjaw can protect you with reaction while you rain arrows
Magical attacks let Ironjaw damage incorporeal creatures

items.name: Action Economy
bullets: **No action required** ‚Äî all benefits are passive while worn
Companion can use reaction to impose disadvantage on one attack against you (1/short rest)

items.name: Tactical Advantages
bullets: Companion becomes viable tank with increased HP
+2 damage makes companion attacks meaningful at higher levels
Magical attacks overcome common resistances
Charm/fear immunity keeps companion in the fight

blocks.text: Forged in the First Age by the Archdruid Kelthanas Ironbark, these rings were created to honor the rangers who stood beside their animal companions during the War of Thorns. Only seven were made, each quenched in the Moonwell of Eternal Spring and blessed by the Great Bear Spirit. This ring was thought lost when Ranger-Captain Thorne Grimbear fell defending Silverwood Pass ‚Äî until you recovered it.
blocks.attribution: ‚Äî From the Archives of the Emerald Enclave

items.name: Identifying Marks
bullets: Druidic runes spelling "WILD-HEART" on inner band
Maker's mark: Tiny oak leaf near size adjustment
Serial glyph: Three claw marks (3rd of 7 rings made)

items.name: Detection Properties
bullets: **Detect Magic:** Strong transmutation with hints of divination
**Identify:** Reveals all properties and name "Kelthanas"
**Legend Lore:** Uncovers full history and previous wielders

items.name: Primal Bond
bullets: Communicate simple emotions telepathically within 100 feet
Companion gains +10 feet movement speed
Always know direction and distance to companion (same plane)

items.name: Wild Sense
bullets: As an action, see/hear through companion's senses for 10 minutes
You are blind and deaf to your own surroundings during this time
Recharges on a long rest
